mapper.sql: no, memberid, title, regdate, cnt, (sysdate-regdate) * 24 as NewImgTerm
mapper.select: select from board order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into board(no, memberid, password, title, email, content, ip, port, browser, filename, originalFileName, filesize) values(board_seq.nextval, #{memberid}, #{password}, #{title}, #{email}, #{content}, #{ip}, #{port}, #{browser}, #{fileName}, #{originalFileName}, #{fileSize})
